findings.rationale: The obligation to maintain confidentiality indefinitely may expose the Receiving Party to ongoing liability without a clear endpoint.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Specificity in Confidential Information Definition
findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may lead to ambiguity and disputes over what is considered confidential.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party.
